abstract: Singer Adele does not fit mold of typical pop star--she is full-figured mother who barely uses social media--yet is selling more albums than most others in music industry; officials estimate that her new album, entitled 25, sold at least 3.2 million copies in United States in its first week, smashing N Sync's opening-week sales record of 2.4 million in 2000.
lead_paragraph: A 27-year-old mother who pretty much ignores social media is selling more albums than anyone in the sagging music business thought was still possible.

headline.main: Adele Goes Viral, No Selfies or Tweets Needed
headline.print_headline: Without Selfies or Streaming, Adele Hits Gold

snippet: A 27-year-old mother who pretty much ignores social media is selling more albums than anyone in the sagging music business thought was still possible.
